scarynight.start: §6§lA terrifying night has come! Monsters become more aggressive, and you are not allowed.
scarynight.end: §6§lThe fear of the night has gone... But it may come again.
scarynight.command.help:
§6Command usage
§7- §6/scarynight: Display plugin information.
§7- §6/scarynight start: Start ScaryNight.
§7- §6/scarynight end: Stop ScaryNight.
§7- §6/scarynight language <language code>: Change the language.
